title: Iconoclast

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Investigate two players, learning their role. This bypasses detection immunity.
- Choose to call an assembly the following night with all the NKs in the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If both of the targets of your investigation are NK roles, they will be united, gaining an alternate win condition of the other winning.
- During an assembly, all NKs can speak freely. After an assembly has been called until the next night, all NKs can win with each other. If there is no NK victory by that time, you will die.
- Iconoclast can only roll if there are at least two NK in the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see a Neutral Killing win the game

desc:
